statements: SELECT backer_id, backer_name, backer_email, contribution_amount FROM backers WHERE backer_id = 1;
SELECT backer_name, backer_email, contribution_amount FROM backers WHERE contribution_amount > 100.00;
SELECT backer_name, backer_email, contribution_date FROM backers WHERE contribution_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT backer_id, backer_name, backer_email, contribution_date FROM backers WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC;
SELECT backer_name, campaign_id FROM backers WHERE backer_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT backer_id, backer_name, contribution_amount FROM backers WHERE backer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM backers WHERE contribution_amount > 1000;
SELECT backer_name, backer_email, contribution_amount FROM backers ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC;

SELECT backer_id, backer_name, contribution_date FROM backers WHERE contribution_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT name, email FROM backers ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT backer_name, campaign_name, sent_date FROM backers b JOIN emails_sent es ON b.backer_id = es.backer_id JOIN campaigns c ON es.campaign_id = c.campaign_id;
